value.name: Hearing addresses access to mental health crisis services in Rochester
value.description: May is Mental Health Awareness Month and local advocates and lawmakers held a public hearing on mental health crisis services. In Rochester over the last year, two men Daniel Prude and Tyshon Jones died after encounters with the Rochester police during mental health episodes.

value.name: Police fatally shoot driver in Rochester, New York
value.description: He was taken off life support a week later. Then on March 10 of this year, Rochester police fatally shot Tyshon Jones, a 29-year-old Black man who authorities said was armed with a knife.

value.name: What's changed? Rochester leaders, community activists reflect on year since George Floyd's death
value.description: Another change is the way in which the city is sharing information regarding police killings. We see with Tyshon Jones and Mark Gaskill, there wasn't that cover-up that we saw with Daniel Prude ...

value.name: Fatal RPD shooting: What body camera video of deadly encounter with Mark Gaskill shows
value.description: Officer Matthew Drake shot and killed Tyshon Jones, who police said was menacing the officers with a knife and ignored multiple commands to drop it. The Democrat and Chronicle has a pending ...

value.name: Perinton house a ‘total loss’ after major fire, no injuries reported
value.description: A house and garage in Perinton suffered major damage after a fire Tuesday afternoon. Crews responded to the home on Watchet Lane around 1 p.m. Watchet Lane is closed as crews work to extinguish the flames.

value.name: Full List of 229 Black People Killed by Police Since George Floyd's Murder
value.description: U.S. George Floyd Police Killings Police brutality Black Lives Matter At least 229 Black people have been killed by police officers across the U.S. in the year since George Floyd's murder.
